title: Timeout problem that has been reoccurring

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: It happens typically once every once and awhile, then it won't do it for weeks on end, and then It just sits there be it an ally or and enemy waiting to lock in and when it does hit 0, it still doesn't end there. I sit there until I **do** time out. It's more of a nuisance, and I know it will escalate into a problem with the leaver buster system. I was wondering if someone knew what I could do to prevent this from happening again. Please and thank you! <3

This often happens if your connection to the servers isn't 100% stable, which often happens as a result of local network settings that conflict with League. Work through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
